document_data.name: Travis Ormaster
document_data.mainbody: '''Travis Ormaster''' was the steward of Lord [[Partic Thistle]], and served him at [[Thistleflame Keep]] around [[1369 DR]].
document_data.Personality: He was quick-witted and clever, with a brusque manner and sharp wits.
document_data.Possessions: As the steward of his lord, Travis was entrusted with Lord Thistle's signet ring.
document_data.Abilities: Travis had a variety of simple [[Arcane magic|arcane spells]] which he used to perform his administrative work for Lord Thistle.
document_data.Activities: As steward, Travis was responsible for a wide variety of issues at Thistleflame. He managed Lord Thistle's schedule, handled the staff, administered the finances and ensured the manor's stores were kept stocked. Because of his position, he was well aware of the gossip and activities of his staff.
document_data.Relationships: Travis was friends with Lord Thistle's messenger [[Kaleb Fleetwing]], but jealous rivals with the gardener [[Berke Glorata]].
